song.englishname: Every Day I Will Bless You

english.segment1: CHORUS. Everyday I will bless you. Everyday I will praise your name. Everyday I will bless you. Forever and ever and ever and ever; everyday I'll bless you. All your works shall give thanks to you, O Lord, O Lord. And all your faithful shall bless you. They shall speak of the glory of your kingdom. (repeat)
english.segment2: (spoken). Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, everyday!. Everyday I will bless you. Everyday I will praise your name. Everyday I will bless you. Forever and ever and ever and ever; everyday I'll bless you. Everyday, everyday everyday I'll bless your holy name. Forever and ever and ever, I will bless you.
